name: gunk-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.
flavor_text.platinum: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user shoots filthy garbage at the foe to attack. It may also poison the target.
